00029 #include <QFile>
00030 #include <QDataStream>
00031 #include <QSet>
00032 
00033 #include "brisaconfig.h"
00034 
00035 using namespace BrisaCore;
00036 
00037 BrisaConfigurationManager::BrisaConfigurationManager(const QString &configPath,
00038         const QHash<QString, QString> &state) {
00039     this->state = state;
00040     this->configPath = configPath;
00041     this->fileName = "/file.dat";
00042     this->parameterSeparator = ".";
00043     this->directAccess = false;
00044 }
00045 
00046 void BrisaConfigurationManager::setDirectAccess(bool access) {
00047     this->directAccess = access;
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool BrisaConfigurationManager::getDirectAccess() {
00051     return this->directAccess;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void BrisaConfigurationManager::update() {
00055     QFile file(this->configPath + this->fileName);
00056     file.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00057 
00058     QDataStream in(&file);
00059     in >> this->state;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void BrisaConfigurationManager::save() {
00063     QFile file(this->configPath + this->fileName);
00064     file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00065 
00066     QDataStream out(&file);
00067     out << this->state;
00068 }
00069 
00070 QString BrisaConfigurationManager::getParameter(const QString &section,
00071         const QString &parameter) {
00072 
00073     if (getDirectAccess())
00074         update();
00075 
00076     QString str(section);
00077     str.append(parameterSeparator + parameter);
00078     if (this->state.contains(str))
00079         return this->state.value(str);
00080 
00081     return "";
00082 }
00083 
00084 void BrisaConfigurationManager::setParameter(const QString &section,
00085         const QString &parameter, const QString &parValue) {
00086 
00087     QString str(section);
00088     str.append(parameterSeparator + parameter);
00089 
00090     if ((parValue == "") and (this->state.contains(str))) {
00091         this->state.remove(str);
00092     } else {
00093         this->state[str] = parValue;
00094     }
00095 
00096     if (getDirectAccess())
00097         this->save();
00098 
00099 }
00100 
00101 QList<QString> BrisaConfigurationManager::getSectionNames() {
00102 
00103     if (this->getDirectAccess())
00104         this->update();
00105 
00106     QList<QString> sections = this->state.keys();
00107 
00108     for (int i = 0; i < sections.size(); ++i) {
00109         sections.replace(i, sections.at(i).split('.').value(0));
00110     }
00111 
00112     QSet<QString> set = sections.toSet();
00113     QList<QString> auxList = set.toList();
00114     qSort(auxList.begin(), auxList.end());
00115 
00116     return auxList;
00117 }
00118 
00119 QHash<QString, QString> BrisaConfigurationManager::items(const QString &section) {
00120     if (this->getDirectAccess())
00121         this->update();
00122 
00123     QHash<QString, QString> items;
00124     QList<QString> sections = this->state.keys();
00125 
00126     for (int i = 0; i < sections.size(); ++i) {
00127         if (sections[i].split(parameterSeparator).value(0) == section)
00128             items[sections[i].split(parameterSeparator).at(1)]
00129                     = this->state.value(sections[i]);
00130     }
00131 
00132     return items;
00133 }
00134 
00135 bool BrisaConfigurationManager::removeSection(const QString &section) {
00136     QHash<QString, QString> items;
00137 
00138     QList<QString> sections = this->state.keys();
00139     bool error = true;
00140     for (int i = 0; i < sections.size(); ++i) {
00141         if (sections[i].split(parameterSeparator).value(0) == section) {
00142             this->state.remove(sections[i]);
00143             error = false;
00144         }
00145     }
00146 
00147     if (this->getDirectAccess())
00148         this->save();
00149 
00150     return error;
00151 }
